page.title: 20SPECIAL EVENTS IN DUNS
page.content: THE THREE MAIN ANNUAL EVENTS HELD IN DUNS ARE {REIVERS WEEK,THE CROWNING {OF THE WYNSOME MAYDE O,DUNSE AND DUNS {SHOW.} {REIVERS WEEK}STARTED IN{1949}.THE NAME {REIVER}CAME FROM WHEN THE ENGLISH STOLE CATTLE FROM THE SCOTTISH AND VICE-VERSA.THESE PEOPLE WERE CALLED { {REIVERS,}MEANING RAIDERS.DURING OUR { {REIVERS WEEK}OUR {REIVER}HAS A LASS. ON THE WEDNESDAY OF{REIVERS WEEK} THE CROWNING OF{THE WYNSOME MAYDE} TAKES PLACE.THE WORD{WYNSOME}COMES FROM WHEN THE ENGLISH AND SCOTTISH KIDNAPPED MAIDENS FROM THE OTHER COUNTRY AND TRIED TO BURN THEM,THE COUNTRY WHO OWNED THE MAIDEN CAME AND TOOK HER BACK THEN THEY WOULD CROWN HER.THIS IS NOW CALLED{THE CROWNING OF {THE WYNSOME MAYDE O,DUNSE.} AT{DUNS SHOW}THERE ARE THINGS FOR ALL AGES WITH STALLS &SIDE SHOWS.
